title: (x) NASCAR Timeless - Parkway Hotel {Chesh}
content:
I'm drawing a blank on the geometric script used for 'Timeless' in this logo. The 'T' may be from somethign else.   
   
Thanks in advance, kids.   
   
 ![NASCAR Timeless](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524125739im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/28809.jpg)
author: grant

comments.content:
I miss the Parkway.   
   
They had a great old diner. I spent many Friday nights there,   
drinking too much coffee, smoking too many cigarettes and   
talking about type with a good friend of mine.   
   
It's long gone now, demolished to make way for the last few   
miles of the U.S. Interstate Highway System.   
   
All that's left is Chank's font.

Heh, I just realised that the Parkway that inspired Chank was   
_not_ the Parkway Motel, but the Parkway _Theater_, which still exists.   
The rest is true, though. :-)
